name: rosmaro-binding-utils
description: Makes writing simple rosmaro bindings easier.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=production babel src -d dist
scripts.readme: cat src/README.md > README.md && find src/*/ -type f -name README.md | xargs cat >> README.md

author: ≈Åukasz Makuch <kontakt@lukaszmakuch.pl> (https://lukaszmakuch.pl)
